General.Name: Beijing Tianyishangjia New Material Corp Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Tianyishangjia New Material Corp., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of brake pads and brake shoe series products for high-speed trains, EMUs, locomotives, and urban rail transit vehicles. It offers powder metallurgy brake pads and synthetic brake pads/brake shoes, polymer composite materials, carbon-based composite products, carbon ceramic car brake disc, resin-based carbon fiber composite products, lightweight coated brake discs, and aviation structural parts, as well as photovoltaic thermal field system components. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 7 Yingbin South Street, Beijing, China, 102433
